item.title: About Jim Gianoglio
item.description: Hi, I’m Jim Gianoglio. I’m a Lead Data Scientist at Bounteous, where I get to play with web analytics and digital marketing data every day. I graduated in 2018 from Carnegie Mellon University with a Master of Science in Information Technology (Business Intelligence & Data Analytics). I love to learn new things, and I love to teach. That’s one of the main reasons for this blog. It gives me an excuse to try new things, experiment a bit, and share what I’ve learned along the way.
